title: 2bath-Deleaded-Near Downtown Peabody
posting_body: ['Beautiful open floor plan second floor apartment, deleaded, contains 8 rooms: 4 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, living room, dinning room, large kitchen, office/den, featured laminated floors, modern LED light/fixtures, newer windows, stainless steel appliances, backyard for entertaining.', ' W/D in building.', ' Conveniently located near downtown Peabody.', 'Parking on street (no off street parking).', 'Near highway 128, 95, 1 and route 114, Bus transportation, Salem Commuter Rail Station, Salem State University, Peabody Essex Museum, North-Shore Mall, Liberty Tree Mall, and restaurants.', ' Available on 9/1/22.', 'Required:', '1) The first, last and security deposit', '2) One year lease agreement', '3) Income verification and good credit score', '4) References from a previous landlord (s)', 'Owner pays for water and sewer.', ' Tenants are responsible for utilities (gas hot water and electric heat: Peabody has low electric rate)', 'If interested, please respond with your name, phone number and a brief introduction of yourself via above email.', 'Serious inquiries only.']
